MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead, affecting properties in Greenfield Terrace and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:41PM. Our engineers have arrived at the local substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.45AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12.33AM on 15th February 2021.
